html.p: The Insteon app includes a database of Insteon messages that is based upon Insteon's official documentation. However, the documentation is incomplete and may be missing some messages. Messages without the corresponding information is listed below.

search.query: sourcetype=insteon category=* subcategory=* NOT command=* | eval p1=if(extended=1,"E", "S") | eval p2=case(all_link=1,"A", broadcast=1, "B", direct=1, "D") | eval cmd1=if(len(cmd1)==1,"0".cmd1, cmd1) | eval cmd2=if(len(cmd2)==1,"0".cmd2, cmd2) | eval command=p1.p2." 0x".cmd1.cmd2 | stats count as event_count by category_name category subcategory command | sort -count
